feed.title: Documenso Releases
feed.subtitle: Self-hosted software releases generated by selfh.st

entry.title: New release for Documenso: v1.5.5
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • chore: audit log menu item label by @ElTimuro in https://github.com/documenso/documenso/pull/1102
  • fix: swagger documentation authentication by @catalinpit in https://github.com/documenso/documenso/pull/1037
  • fix: mask recipient token by @catalinpit in https://github.com/documenso/documenso/pull/1051
  • feat: updated mobile header by @adithyaakrishna in https://github.com/documenso/documenso/pull/1004
  • feat: add myself as signer by @catalinpit in https://github.com/documenso/documenso/pull/1091
  • fix: duplicate modal instances from hotkey activation by @deepgolani4 in https://github.com/documenso/documenso/pull/1058
  • chore: fix text padding by @adithyaakrishna in https://github.com/documenso/documenso/pull/1107
  • fix: duplicate templates by @dguyen in https://github.com/documenso/documenso/pull/1104
  • feat: add extra info for recipient roles by @catalinpit in https://github.com/documenso/documenso/pull/1105
  • fix: prevent signing draft documents by @dguyen in https://github.com/documenso/documenso/pull/1111
  • fix: update document deletion logic by @dguyen in https://github.com/documenso/documenso/pull/1100
  • feat: update emails for self-signer by @catalinpit in https://github.com/documenso/documenso/pull/1108
  • feat: download completed docs via api by @catalinpit in https://github.com/documenso/documenso/pull/1078
  • chore: added filename extension check by @adithyaakrishna in https://github.com/documenso/documenso/pull/1106
  • fix: hide account action reauth by @dguyen in https://github.com/documenso/documenso/pull/1115
  • fix: disable cert download by @dguyen in https://github.com/documenso/documenso/pull/1114
  • feat: add visible completed fields by @dguyen in https://github.com/documenso/documenso/pull/1109
  • fix: hide team webhooks from users by @dguyen in https://github.com/documenso/documenso/pull/1116
  • fix: use cdp and upgrade playwright again by @Mythie in https://github.com/documenso/documenso/pull/1117
  • fix: ssr feature flags by @dguyen in https://github.com/documenso/documenso/pull/1119
  • fix: increase trpc max duration by @dguyen in https://github.com/documenso/documenso/pull/1121
  • fix: complete document when all recipients are CC by @catalinpit in https://github.com/documenso/documenso/pull/1113
  • chore: updated dark mode text by @adithyaakrishna in https://github.com/documenso/documenso/pull/1129
  • chore: fix button styling by @adithyaakrishna in https://github.com/documenso/documenso/pull/1132
  • fix: delete pending documents by @dguyen in https://github.com/documenso/documenso/pull/1118
  • fix: improve sealing process by @Mythie in https://github.com/documenso/documenso/pull/1133
  • fix: enforce users to have stripe account by @dguyen in https://github.com/documenso/documenso/pull/1131
  • fix: disable encrypted pdfs by @dguyen in https://github.com/documenso/documenso/pull/1130
  • fix: custom email message for self-signers by @catalinpit in https://github.com/documenso/documenso/pull/1120

New Contributors

  • @deepgolani4 made their first contribution in https://github.com/documenso/documenso/pull/1058

Full Changelog: https://github.com/documenso/documenso/compare/v1.5.4...v1.5.5

entry.title: New release for Documenso: v1.5.6
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • fix: profile claim name length by @ElTimuro in https://github.com/documenso/documenso/pull/1144
  • feat: add general template enhancements by @dguyen in https://github.com/documenso/documenso/pull/1147
  • fix: allow template recipients to be filled by @dguyen in https://github.com/documenso/documenso/pull/1148
  • chore: update github actions by @adithyaakrishna in https://github.com/documenso/documenso/pull/1085
  • fix: unauthorized access error api tokens page team by @catalinpit in https://github.com/documenso/documenso/pull/1134
  • chore: updated triage label by @adithyaakrishna in https://github.com/documenso/documenso/pull/1152
  • feat: add template enhancements by @dguyen in https://github.com/documenso/documenso/pull/1154
  • fix: syntax in production compose.yml by @david-loe in https://github.com/documenso/documenso/pull/1143
  • feat: show time in documents table by @rushatgabhane in https://github.com/documenso/documenso/pull/1123
  • chore: update docker compose command by @ephraimduncan in https://github.com/documenso/documenso/pull/1159
  • chore: change default sender name to match prod by @ElTimuro in https://github.com/documenso/documenso/pull/1161
  • chore: update gitpod config by @ephraimduncan in https://github.com/documenso/documenso/pull/1151
  • feat: sealing robustness by @Mythie in https://github.com/documenso/documenso/pull/1170
  • feat: pin input component by @ephraimduncan in https://github.com/documenso/documenso/pull/936
  • fix: Remove document on go back click on step 1 by @prajwalkulkarni in https://github.com/documenso/documenso/pull/910
  • fix: show team url in dropdown menu on hover by @sumitbishti in https://github.com/documenso/documenso/pull/1122
  • chore: add more tests by @ephraimduncan in https://github.com/documenso/documenso/pull/1079
  • feat: remove the existing empty signer if its the only one by @adithyaakrishna in https://github.com/documenso/documenso/pull/1127
  • feat: add kysely for raw type-safe SQL queries by @catalinpit in https://github.com/documenso/documenso/pull/1041
  • fix: Capitalise "Stripe" by @sampoder in https://github.com/documenso/documenso/pull/1173
  • feat: add oidc support by @tankerkiller125 in https://github.com/documenso/documenso/pull/1103
  • feat: add direct templates links by @dguyen in https://github.com/documenso/documenso/pull/1165
  • fix: add correct role names for direct templates by @dguyen in https://github.com/documenso/documenso/pull/1179
  • fix: downloaded files should have _signed by @ephraimduncan in https://github.com/documenso/documenso/pull/1149
  • Chore/sunset-early-adopters by @ElTimuro in https://github.com/documenso/documenso/pull/1182
  • fix: add regular plan to price type enum by @Mythie in https://github.com/documenso/documenso/pull/1184
  • fix: correctly insert fields on rotated pages by @dguyen in https://github.com/documenso/documenso/pull/1183

New Contributors

  • @rushatgabhane made their first contribution in https://github.com/documenso/documenso/pull/1123
  • @prajwalkulkarni made their first contribution in https://github.com/documenso/documenso/pull/910
  • @sampoder made their first contribution in https://github.com/documenso/documenso/pull/1173
  • @tankerkiller125 made their first contribution in https://github.com/documenso/documenso/pull/1103

Full Changelog: https://github.com/documenso/documenso/compare/v1.5.5...v1.5.6

entry.title: New release for Documenso: v1.6.0
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • fix: carousel on mobile screen by @ephraimduncan in https://github.com/documenso/documenso/pull/1186
  • chore: freelance-blog by @ElTimuro in https://github.com/documenso/documenso/pull/1175
  • chore: direct links announce by @ElTimuro in https://github.com/documenso/documenso/pull/1177
  • chore: bump date by @ElTimuro in https://github.com/documenso/documenso/pull/1189
  • feat: add changelog to marketing by @ElTimuro in https://github.com/documenso/documenso/pull/1190
  • chore: freelancer blog article #2 by @ElTimuro in https://github.com/documenso/documenso/pull/1181
  • feat: background tasks by @Mythie in https://github.com/documenso/documenso/pull/1160
  • fix: show field on pending document by @ephraimduncan in https://github.com/documenso/documenso/pull/1158
  • feat: force signature fields for document signers by @catalinpit in https://github.com/documenso/documenso/pull/1139
  • chore: add direct link video by @ElTimuro in https://github.com/documenso/documenso/pull/1194
  • feat: admin activation metrics by @ephraimduncan in https://github.com/documenso/documenso/pull/1080
  • fix: direct links for teams are generated wrong by @ephraimduncan in https://github.com/documenso/documenso/pull/1197
  • fix: show correct authentication action for account required by @Mythie in https://github.com/documenso/documenso/pull/1191
  • fix: docker ci by @dguyen in https://github.com/documenso/documenso/pull/1201
  • fix: enable yearly team pricing by @dguyen in https://github.com/documenso/documenso/pull/1199
  • feat: add more template API endpoints by @dguyen in https://github.com/documenso/documenso/pull/1198
  • feat: add public profiles by @dguyen in https://github.com/documenso/documenso/pull/1180
  • chore: nda-blog by @ElTimuro in https://github.com/documenso/documenso/pull/1202
  • chore: profiles announce blogpost by @ElTimuro in https://github.com/documenso/documenso/pull/1211
  • chore: last text touches by @ElTimuro in https://github.com/documenso/documenso/pull/1212
  • feat: move document to team by @ephraimduncan in https://github.com/documenso/documenso/pull/1210
  • chore: changelog 156 by @ElTimuro in https://github.com/documenso/documenso/pull/1213
  • Chore/changelog-156 by @ElTimuro in https://github.com/documenso/documenso/pull/1214
  • Chore/freelancer-3-hacks by @ElTimuro in https://github.com/documenso/documenso/pull/1218
  • chore: final touches by @ElTimuro in https://github.com/documenso/documenso/pull/1219
  • feat: send custom email to signers of direct template documents by @ephraimduncan in https://github.com/documenso/documenso/pull/1215
  • fix: use team avatar everywhere by @ephraimduncan in https://github.com/documenso/documenso/pull/1220
  • feat: move template to team by @ephraimduncan in https://github.com/documenso/documenso/pull/1217
  • feat: add user conversion count to admin panel by @ephraimduncan in https://github.com/documenso/documenso/pull/1150
  • feat: allow anonymous smtp authentication by @Rainson12 in https://github.com/documenso/documenso/pull/1204
  • feat: resend document via API by @catalinpit in https://github.com/documenso/documenso/pull/1226
  • feat: add external id to documents and templates by @Mythie in https://github.com/documenso/documenso/pull/1227
  • chore: add more field types by @catalinpit in https://github.com/documenso/documenso/pull/1141
  • chore: vial-blog by @ElTimuro in https://github.com/documenso/documenso/pull/1231
  • feat: documentation site by @catalinpit in https://github.com/documenso/documenso/pull/1101
  • chore: links new docs by @ElTimuro in https://github.com/documenso/documenso/pull/1233
  • chore: add docs to nav by @ElTimuro in https://github.com/documenso/documenso/pull/1235
  • fix: replace default favicon with documenso logo by @samyakshah3008 in https://github.com/documenso/documenso/pull/1237

New Contributors

  • @Rainson12 made their first contribution in https://github.com/documenso/documenso/pull/1204

Full Changelog: https://github.com/documenso/documenso/compare/v1.5.6...v1.6.0

entry.title: New release for Documenso: v1.6.1
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • chore: add new colors by @ephraimduncan in https://github.com/documenso/documenso/pull/1224
  • chore: update signup text by @ephraimduncan in https://github.com/documenso/documenso/pull/1234
  • chore: blog-basic-signing-and-roles by @ElTimuro in https://github.com/documenso/documenso/pull/1241
  • fix: typo in pricing table by @poeck in https://github.com/documenso/documenso/pull/1239
  • fix: API token deletion not reflected in cache until page reload by @cchirag in https://github.com/documenso/documenso/pull/1128
  • chore: changelog-160 by @ElTimuro in https://github.com/documenso/documenso/pull/1247
  • chore: team stuff by @ephraimduncan in https://github.com/documenso/documenso/pull/1228
  • fix: correct grammar on enterprise page by @mark-pitblado in https://github.com/documenso/documenso/pull/1252
  • feat: initial i18n marketing implementation by @dguyen in https://github.com/documenso/documenso/pull/1223
  • chore: add translations by @Mythie in https://github.com/documenso/documenso/pull/1253
  • chore: translation typo by @ElTimuro in https://github.com/documenso/documenso/pull/1255
  • chore: rename "none" document access to "no restrictions" by @raikasdev in https://github.com/documenso/documenso/pull/1138
  • fix: truncation of titles to fix UI breaks by @rhit-daviscl in https://github.com/documenso/documenso/pull/1162
  • fix: dateformat api bug by @catalinpit in https://github.com/documenso/documenso/pull/1238
  • fix: add new environmental variables for render deployment by @ephraimduncan in https://github.com/documenso/documenso/pull/1174
  • chore: last touches by @ElTimuro in https://github.com/documenso/documenso/pull/1263
  • fix: use native URL parser instead of wrong regex by @aeris in https://github.com/documenso/documenso/pull/1206
  • feat: allow oidc only signup and trust mail addresses by @Rainson12 in https://github.com/documenso/documenso/pull/1208
  • feat: make oidc sign in button text configurable by @Rainson12 in https://github.com/documenso/documenso/pull/1209
  • fix: limits syncing issue by @emmpaz in https://github.com/documenso/documenso/pull/1195
  • fix: fields name/label on dark mode by @catalinpit in https://github.com/documenso/documenso/pull/1242
  • chore: Update .env.example commenting by @sjacobflaherty in https://github.com/documenso/documenso/pull/1257
  • fix: show signup option only to users without existing accounts by @ephraimduncan in https://github.com/documenso/documenso/pull/1221
  • fix: radio and checkbox fields issues with empty values by @catalinpit in https://github.com/documenso/documenso/pull/1273
  • fix: support dynamic external ids for direct templates by @Mythie in https://github.com/documenso/documenso/pull/1274
  • fix: download audit log certificate by @catalinpit in https://github.com/documenso/documenso/pull/1268
  • feat: add initials field type by @catalinpit in https://github.com/documenso/documenso/pull/1279

New Contributors

  • @poeck made their first contribution in https://github.com/documenso/documenso/pull/1239
  • @cchirag made their first contribution in https://github.com/documenso/documenso/pull/1128
  • @mark-pitblado made their first contribution in https://github.com/documenso/documenso/pull/1252
  • @raikasdev made their first contribution in https://github.com/documenso/documenso/pull/1138
  • @rhit-daviscl made their first contribution in https://github.com/documenso/documenso/pull/1162
  • @aeris made their first contribution in https://github.com/documenso/documenso/pull/1206
  • @emmpaz made their first contribution in https://github.com/documenso/documenso/pull/1195
  • @sjacobflaherty made their first contribution in https://github.com/documenso/documenso/pull/1257

Full Changelog: https://github.com/documenso/documenso/compare/v1.6.0...v1.6.1

entry.title: New release for Documenso: v1.7.0
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • fix: move sealing to a background job by @Mythie in https://github.com/documenso/documenso/pull/1287
  • feat: advanced fields article by @catalinpit in https://github.com/documenso/documenso/pull/1276
  • feat: copy and paste fields by @ephraimduncan in https://github.com/documenso/documenso/pull/1193
  • feat: automatically set public profile url for OIDC users by @Rainson12 in https://github.com/documenso/documenso/pull/1225
  • feat: update the email templates to reflect team-specific information. by @ephraimduncan in https://github.com/documenso/documenso/pull/1229
  • chore: add translations by @Mythie in https://github.com/documenso/documenso/pull/1295
  • chore: update readme for manual self-hosting by @alessiodam in https://github.com/documenso/documenso/pull/1270
  • docs: Fix documentation typo regarding the Webhook secret header by @yigitkeremoktay in https://github.com/documenso/documenso/pull/1278
  • feat: prefill fields via api by @catalinpit in https://github.com/documenso/documenso/pull/1261
  • feat: web i18n by @dguyen in https://github.com/documenso/documenso/pull/1286
  • fix: dialog close on refresh by @dguyen in https://github.com/documenso/documenso/pull/1135
  • chore: add translations by @Mythie in https://github.com/documenso/documenso/pull/1305
  • chore: add translations by @Mythie in https://github.com/documenso/documenso/pull/1306
  • fix: make invite and confirmations long lived by @Mythie in https://github.com/documenso/documenso/pull/1309
  • fix: broken pages by translation tags by @catalinpit in https://github.com/documenso/documenso/pull/1312
  • feat: disable 2fa with backup codes by @ephraimduncan in https://github.com/documenso/documenso/pull/1314
  • feat: update createFields api endpoint by @catalinpit in https://github.com/documenso/documenso/pull/1311
  • chore: upgrade next by @Mythie in https://github.com/documenso/documenso/pull/1300
  • fix: a grammer error by @apsinghdev in https://github.com/documenso/documenso/pull/1316
  • feat: embed signing experience by @Mythie in https://github.com/documenso/documenso/pull/1322
  • fix: show the existing field meta when editing a template fields by @Etrenak in https://github.com/documenso/documenso/pull/1323
  • fix: broken endpoint to update a field in a document by @Etrenak in https://github.com/documenso/documenso/pull/1319
  • chore: add docs for translations by @dguyen in https://github.com/documenso/documenso/pull/1310
  • feat: Added Elestio as one-click deploy option by @kaiwalyakoparkar in https://github.com/documenso/documenso/pull/1302
  • chore: add translations by @Mythie in https://github.com/documenso/documenso/pull/1308
  • fix: changed the default file path for NEXT_PRIVATE_SIGNING_LOCAL_FIL… by @binary-amigo in https://github.com/documenso/documenso/pull/1277
  • feat: allow recipient to select signature color by @catalinpit in https://github.com/documenso/documenso/pull/1325
  • feat: add and use NEXT_PRIVATE_INTERNAL_WEBAPP_URL by @david-loe in https://github.com/documenso/documenso/pull/1298
  • chore: embedding blog post by @Mythie in https://github.com/documenso/documenso/pull/1329

New Contributors

  • @alessiodam made their first contribution in https://github.com/documenso/documenso/pull/1270
  • @yigitkeremoktay made their first contribution in https://github.com/documenso/documenso/pull/1278
  • @apsinghdev made their first contribution in https://github.com/documenso/documenso/pull/1316
  • @Etrenak made their first contribution in https://github.com/documenso/documenso/pull/1323
  • @kaiwalyakoparkar made their first contribution in https://github.com/documenso/documenso/pull/1302
  • @binary-amigo made their first contribution in https://github.com/documenso/documenso/pull/1277

Full Changelog: https://github.com/documenso/documenso/compare/v1.6.1...v1.7.0
